languages.text: "Раскаяние — первый шаг к исправлению ошибок. Сделай этот шаг — а затем и следующий. К смерти врага и спасению святыни!"

traits.locale_text: "Раскаяние — первый шаг к исправлению ошибок. Сделай этот шаг — а затем и следующий. К смерти врага и спасению святыни!"

languages.text: "Remorse is the first step to making amends. Take that step, and then take the next. Toward your enemy's death and the relic's salvation!"
languages.original_text: "Раскаяние — первый шаг к исправлению ошибок. Сделай этот шаг — а затем и следующий. К смерти врага и спасению святыни!"

traits.locale_text: "Remorse is the first step to making amends. Take that step, and then take the next. Toward your enemy's death and the relic's salvation!"
"Remorse is the first step to making amends. Take that step, and then take the next. Toward your enemy's death and the relic's salvation!"
"Remorse is the first step to making amends. Take that step, and then take the next. Toward your enemy's death and the relic's salvation!"
"Remorse is the first step to making amends. Take that step, and then take the next. Toward your enemy's death and the relic's salvation!"
"Remorse is the first step to making amends. Take that step, and then take the next. Toward your enemy's death and the relic's salvation!"

languages.text: 「後悔は償いの最初の一歩だ。その一歩を踏み出し、さらに次の一歩へ。目的はお前の敵の死と聖遺物の救出だ！」
languages.original_text: "Remorse is the first step to making amends. Take that step, and then take the next. Toward your enemy's death and the relic's salvation!"

traits.locale_text: 「後悔は償いの最初の一歩だ。その一歩を踏み出し、さらに次の一歩へ。目的はお前の敵の死と聖遺物の救出だ！」

languages.text: “只有心怀悔恨，才能弥补错误。走好这一步，之后再走好下一步，不断前进。为了消灭敌人，为了夺回圣物，前进吧！”
languages.original_text: "Remorse is the first step to making amends. Take that step, and then take the next. Toward your enemy's death and the relic's salvation!"

traits.locale_text: “只有心怀悔恨，才能弥补错误。走好这一步，之后再走好下一步，不断前进。为了消灭敌人，为了夺回圣物，前进吧！”

languages.text: « Le remords est le premier pas sur la voie de la rédemption. Faites-le, puis continuez sur votre lancée. C'est ainsi que vous éliminerez votre ennemi et que vous sauverez la relique ! »
languages.original_text: "Remorse is the first step to making amends. Take that step, and then take the next. Toward your enemy's death and the relic's salvation!"

traits.locale_text: « Le remords est le premier pas sur la voie de la rédemption. Faites-le, puis continuez sur votre lancée. C'est ainsi que vous éliminerez votre ennemi et que vous sauverez la relique ! »

languages.text: «Los remordimientos son el primer paso hacia la enmienda. Dé ese paso. Y después el siguiente, ¡hacia la muerte del enemigo y la salvación de la reliquia!».
languages.original_text: "Remorse is the first step to making amends. Take that step, and then take the next. Toward your enemy's death and the relic's salvation!"

traits.locale_text: «Los remordimientos son el primer paso hacia la enmienda. Dé ese paso. Y después el siguiente, ¡hacia la muerte del enemigo y la salvación de la reliquia!».

languages.text: "Reue ist der erste Schritt zur Wiedergutmachung. Macht diesen Schritt und dann den nächsten. Bis zum Tod Eures Feindes und der Rettung des Relikts!"
languages.original_text: "Remorse is the first step to making amends. Take that step, and then take the next. Toward your enemy's death and the relic's salvation!"

traits.locale_text: "Reue ist der erste Schritt zur Wiedergutmachung. Macht diesen Schritt und dann den nächsten. Bis zum Tod Eures Feindes und der Rettung des Relikts!"

languages.text: "Pişmanlık, ıslaha giden yoldaki ilk adımdır. O adımı at, sonra bir sonrakini at... Düşmanlarının ölümü ve yadigârın kurtuluşuna adım adım ilerle!"
languages.original_text: "Remorse is the first step to making amends. Take that step, and then take the next. Toward your enemy's death and the relic's salvation!"

traits.locale_text: "Pişmanlık, ıslaha giden yoldaki ilk adımdır. O adımı at ve bir sonrakini de... Düşmanlarının ölümü ve yadigârın kurtuluşu için!"
